quiz.title: Geography Exam
quiz.description: Let's test how well you know about geography.

question.query: What continent is in this picture?
Which country is in this picture?

blank-query.post: Down, about a bunch of rabbits, won the 1972 Carnegie Medal

question.query: Which of the following statements is false
question.option: Aztec mythology includes a rabbit pantheon.
In Japanese folklore, rabbits live on the moon.
In Stanford tradition, rubbing the nose of a rabbit guarantees an A on the CS108 class project

question.query: List three of the "Eight Culinary Cuisines" of China.
